summary: The Captain of a ferry boat between the restricted British colony in Gibraltar and Spanish Morocco has a woman of differing appeal and temperament in each port.
cast: Alec Guinness|Peter Bull|Charles Goldner|Miles Malleson|Claudia Grey|Ann Heffernan|Arthur Gomez|Ferdy Mayne|George Benson|Joss Ambler|Victor Fairley|Michael Balfour|Robert Adair|Sebastian Cabot|Bill Fraser|Jacinta Dicks|Yvonne De Carlo|Alejandro Martínez|Tutte Lemkow|Andreas Malandrinos|Armand Guinle|Paul Armstrong|Nicholas Phipps|Raymond Hoole|Celia Johnson|Henry B. Longhurst|Bernard Rebel|Ambrosine Phillpotts|Catharina Ferraz|Roger Delgado|Walter Crisham|Joyce Barbour|Ali Allen|Pauline Challoner|Martin Lyder|Louis Matto|Roy Purcell|Robert Rietty|Joe Wadham|Johnny Wyne
title: El paraíso del capitán
